name: no_pass
description: Your policy doesn't require a password at all.
event: Some employees use empty passwords. With time such behaviour starts to spread to the point that people start expecting that they can login anywhere without having to type a password.
consequences: Your division is under constant successful attacks, as intruders don't even need to guess passwords at times.
impress-upper: Not having a minimum length for a password defeats the purpose of any other policy you may have set
impress-lower: Changing this policy will make a better secured system.
